sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import placeholder from '../assets/placeholder.png' import '../styles/PressDetails.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function Press(props) { return (
title goes here insert the quotes {props.title} LinkLonk
) } export default Press [{"id":1, "about_des":"Samuel Brett Williams is an award-winning playwright, screenwriter, and director. His plays have been produced everywhere from New York City to Moscow, Russia. He has developed films and television shows for 26 Keys Productions, Room 101, Character Brigade, Naked Faith Entertainment, and Hot Snakes Media.", "client_photo":"https://www.gptcplays.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/Williams-Samuel-Brett-Photo-300x300.jpg", "films":[{"id":1,"title":"The Revival","film_photo":null,"director":"Jennifer Gerber","screenplay":"Samuel Brett Williams","stars":"David Rysdahl, Zachary Booth, Raymond McAnally, Lucy Faust, Stephen Ellis","status":"Released","description":"A secret love affair between a southern Baptist preacher and a young drifter challenges the equilibrium of a growing church.","type_film":"Feature Film","homeId":1},{"id":3,"title":"Has Been Beauty Queen","film_photo":null,"director":"Jennifer Gerber","screenplay":"Jennifer Gerber, Samuel Brett Williams","stars":"Margo Martindale, Jennifer Nettles, Kristin Chenoweth, Chrissy Metz","status":"Pre Production","description":"Andi , 16, successfully juggles school and her gig at the BBQ joint but struggles as caretaker for her undiagnosed bipolar mother Candy and her younger multiracial half-sister Lexy. With hopes of winning a college scholarship, she turns to the local pageant circuit. Tensions caused by the crown surmounts when Candy is hospitalized after a manic episode. Andi blows off picking her mom up from the hospital and travels with Lexy to compete for Miss Teen Arkansas. Ultimately, she doesn’t win the crown, but learns she is better off being - a Has Been Beauty Queen.","type_film":"Feature Film","homeId":1},{"id":5,"title":"Crash Queen","film_photo":null,"director":"Jennifer Gerber","screenplay":"Samuel Brett Williams, Jennifer Gerber","stars":"N/A","status":"N/A","description":"Molly can fix an engine better than anyone, but in a town where the gender barriers are as old as the car parts, she spends her days as the receptionist at an auto repair shop. Molly needs an outlet, and ends up finding one through the demolition derby. As the first woman to compete in the male dominated sport in Arkansas, Molly must not only master the game, but she must win the respect of the men who are fighting to keep her out of the competition.","type_film":"Feature Film","homeId":1}]}]
